document_data.name: ''Wand of Arcane Disjunction''
document_data.Powers: These wands were [[enchanted]] with [[spell]]s that could ''[[dispel magic]]''. Each use of the wand exhausted two charges, and at maximum, a wand could hold up to fifty charges.
document_data.History:
As of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''wands of arcane disjunction'' were a topic of heated discussion among [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s. Commonly, these wands were sold by [[enchanter]]s to [[adventurer]]s and militiamen only to be used to kill and harm fellow spellcasters. Many considered the wands in poor taste and found it disturbing that some wizards created items so deadly to their kin. Regardless of the sentiment, ''wands of arcane disjunction'' were in high demand, and merchants who sold them were only happy as heated discourse only bolstered sales.
